method.name: ItemId
method.comment: Return the stable ID for the item at position. If HasStableIds would return false this method should return -1. The default implementation of this method returns -1. Position : Adapter position to query Return the stable ID of the item at position

method.name: ItemViewType
method.comment: Return the view type of the item at <u>position</u> for the purposes of view recycling.

property.name: HasStableIds
property.comment:
Returns true if this adapter publishes a unique <u>long</u> value that can act as a key for the item at a given position in the data set. If that item is relocated in the data set, the ID returned for that item should be the same.
Return true if this adapter's items have stable IDs

class.name: com.aghajari.rv.Amir_RecyclerView
class.event: GetItemOffsets (OutRect As Rect,Item As Object,Position As Int)

method.name: ComputeScrollExtent
method.comment: Compute the extent of the scrollbar's thumb within the range.

method.name: DesignerCreateView
method.comment: Don't Call This Method !

method.name: DefaultItemAnimator
method.comment: Use Default RecyclerView Item Animator

method.name: SmoothScrollToPosition2
method.comment: Speed : Milliseconds per inch or -1 for set default speed

method.name: LinearSnapHelper2
method.comment: Gravity : SnapHelper Gravity : START-LEFT | END-RIGHT | BOTTOM | TOP EnableSnapLastItem : Enable snapping of the last item that's snappable. Note you can't see the last item completely if this is enabled. Event : RecyclerEventName_onSnap (Position As Int)

method.name: SmoothScrollBy
method.comment:
Animate a scroll by the given amount of pixels along either axis.
dx: Pixels to scroll horizontally dy: Pixels to scroll vertically

method.name: OffsetChildrenHorizontal
method.comment: Offset the bounds of all child views by dx pixels.

method.name: Fling
method.comment:
Begin a standard fling with an initial velocity along each axis in pixels per second.
velocityX: Initial horizontal velocity in pixels per second velocityY: Initial vertical velocity in pixels per second

method.name: UpdateViews
method.comment: Update Visible Items and raise onUpdateViews event onUpdateViews (Item As Object,Position As Int)

method.name: Initializer
method.comment: Initialize RecyclerView Don't Forgot to set RecyclerView Layout And RecyclerView Adapter ! Layout : Linear Layout Example : Dim RecyclerView As Amir_RecyclerView RecyclerView.Initializer("Amir").ListView.ReverseLayout(True).Build Grid Layout Example : Dim RecyclerView As Amir_RecyclerView RecyclerView.Initializer("Amir").GridView(3).Build Adapters : Show With Default Adapter : RecyclerView.DefaultAdapter Sub Amir_onCreateViewHolder (Parent As Panel,ViewType As Int) End Sub Sub Amir_onBindViewHolder (Parent As Panel,Position As int) End Sub Sub Amir_GetItemCount As int Return 0 End Sub Use Custom Adapter : RecyclerView.Adapter=CustomAdapter

method.name: UpdateLayout
method.comment: Update RecyclerView Layout Example : RecyclerView.Initializer("Amir").GridView(3).Vertical.Build ... RecyclerView.UpdateLayout.GridView.SpanCount(4)

method.name: InvalidateItemDecorations
method.comment: Invalidates all ItemDecorations.

method.name: DefaultAdapter
method.comment: Initialize Default Adapter With RecyclerView EventName Example : RecyclerView.DefaultAdapter Sub EventName_onCreateViewHolder (Parent As Panel,ViewType As Int) End Sub Sub EventName_onBindViewHolder (Parent As Panel,Position As int) End Sub Sub EventName_GetItemCount As int Return 0 End Sub

method.name: DividerHorizontal
method.comment: For layout manager having vertical orientation to draw horizontal divider Example : RecyclerView.DividarHorizontal.Color(Colors.LightGray).Margin(4dip).Size(1dip)

method.name: FlingListener
method.comment: Set a RecyclerView OnFlingListener for this RecyclerView. Events : EventName_onFling (velocityX As int, velocityY As int) As Boolean Example : RecyclerView.Initializer("Amir").ListView.Build ... RecyclerView.FlingListener(True) ... Sub Amir_onFling (velocityX As int, velocityY As int) As Boolean Log("velocityX:" &velocityX&" | velocityY:"&velocityY) Return RecyclerView.Fling(velocityX,velocityY) 'Standard Fling End Sub

method.name: ItemOffsetsListener
method.comment: Enable or disable item offsets listener Event : EventName_GetItemOffsets (OutRect As Rect,Item As Object,Position As Int) Hidden Events : EventName_onDraw (c As Canvas) EventName_onDrawOver (c As Canvas) _________________________________________________________________________ Example : Space between items : RecyclerView.ItemOffsetsListener(True) Sub RecyclerView_GetItemOffsets (OutRect As Rect,Item As Object,Position As Int) OutRect.Top=10dip If Position = Recycler.Adapter2.ItemCount-1 Then OutRect.Bottom=10dip End If OutRect.Left=10dip OutRect.Right=10dip End Sub

method.name: ComputeScrollRange
method.comment: Compute the range that the scrollbar represents.

method.name: PagerSnapHelper2
method.comment: Gravity : PagerSnapHelper Gravity : START-LEFT | END-RIGHT | BOTTOM | TOP EnableSnapLastItem : Enable snapping of the last item that's snappable. Note you can't see the last item completely if this is enabled. Event : RecyclerEventName_onSnap (Position As Int)

method.name: SetRecyclerViewStyle
method.comment: Set RecyclerView Theme Note : you can use this method before initialize recyclerview Example (Add ScrollBar): Manifest : CreateResource(values,recycler.xml, ) set theme to recyclerView : RecyclerView.SetRecyclerViewStyle("ScrollbarRecyclerView")

method.name: ComputeScrollOffset
method.comment: Compute the offset of the scrollbar's thumb within the range.

method.name: OffsetChildrenVertical
method.comment: Offset the bounds of all child views by dy pixels.

method.name: DividerVertical
method.comment: For layout manager having horizontal orientation to draw vertical divider Example : RecyclerView.DividarVertical.Color(Colors.LightGray).Margin(4dip).Size(1dip)

method.name: StopScroll
method.comment: Stop any current scroll in progress, such as one started by smoothScrollBy , fling or a touch-initiated fling.

method.name: SwitchLayout
method.comment: Switch RecyclerView Layout Example : RecyclerView.Initializer("Amir").GridView(3).Vertical.Build ... RecyclerView.SwitchLayout.ListView.Vertical.Build

method.name: SwapAdapter
method.comment: Swaps the current adapter with the provided one. Adapter: The new adapter to set, or null to set no adapter. RemoveAndRecycleExistingViews: If set to true, RecyclerView will recycle all existing Views. If adapters have stable ids and/or you want to animate the disappearing views, you may prefer to set this to false.

property.name: LayoutSpanCount
property.comment: Get Recycler Layout Span Count -1 For Unknow And 1 For Linear Type

property.name: IsAttachedToWindow
property.comment: Returns true if RecyclerView is attached to window.

property.name: IsComputingLayout
property.comment: Returns whether RecyclerView is currently computing a layout.

property.name: FlingVelocityMin
property.comment: get the minimum velocity to start a fling.

property.name: Adapter
property.comment: set : Set a new adapter to provide child views on demand. get : Retrieves the previously set adapter or null if no adapter is set.

property.name: LayoutType
property.comment: Get RecyclerView Layout Type

property.name: PreserveFocusAfterLayout
property.comment: Set whether the RecyclerView should try to keep the same Item focused after a layout calculation or not.

property.name: Listeners
property.comment: add or remove listener with new context

property.name: LayoutDirection
property.comment: Support Rtl (Manifest) : SetApplicationAttribute(android:supportsRtl, "true")

property.name: HasFixedSize
property.comment: RecyclerView can perform several optimizations if it can know in advance that changes in adapter content cannot change the size of the RecyclerView itself. If your use of RecyclerView falls into this category, set this to true.

property.name: ItemAnimator
property.comment: gets the current ItemAnimator for this RecyclerView. or Sets the RecyclerView ItemAnimator that will handle animations involving changes to the items in this RecyclerView.

property.name: ScrollSettings
property.comment: Scroll And ScrollBar Settings Don't Forgot to Enable ScrollBars ! Add ScrollBar : Manifest : CreateResource(values,recycler.xml, ) set theme to recyclerView : RecyclerView.SetRecyclerViewStyle("ScrollbarRecyclerView")

property.name: Adapter2
property.comment: Manage adapter and notifi adapter Example : RecyclerView.Adapter2.NotifiDataSetChanged

property.name: IsAnimating
property.comment: Returns true if RecyclerView is currently running some animations.

property.name: HasPendingAdapterUpdates
property.comment: Returns whether there are pending adapter updates which are not yet applied to the layout.

property.name: ClipToPadding
property.comment: Returns whether this RecyclerView will clip its children to its padding, and resize (but not clip) any EdgeEffect to the padded region, if padding is present.

property.name: Baseline
property.comment: Return the offset of the RecyclerView's text baseline from the its top boundary.

property.name: About
property.comment: Amir_RecyclerView Â© Amir Hossein Aghajari

property.name: ItemViewCacheSize
property.comment: Set the number of offscreen views to retain before adding them to the potentially shared recycled view pool.

property.name: LongClickable
property.comment: Enables or disables long click events for this view.

property.name: ScrollState
property.comment: Return the current scrolling state of the RecyclerView.

property.name: FlingVelocityMax
property.comment: get the maximum fling velocity used by this RecyclerView.

property.name: LayoutFrozen
property.comment: Enable or disable layout and scroll.

property.name: ScrollingTouchSlop
property.comment: Configure the scrolling touch slop for a specific use case. Set up the RecyclerView's scrolling motion threshold based on common usages. Valid arguments are TOUCH_SLOP_DEFAULT and TOUCH_SLOP_PAGING.

field.name: TOUCH_SLOP_DEFAULT
field.comment: Constant for use with ScrollingTouchSlop. Indicates that the RecyclerView should use the standard touch slop for smooth, continuous scrolling.

field.name: SCROLL_AXIS_HORIZONTAL
field.comment: Indicates scrolling along the horizontal axis.

field.name: SCROLL_STATE_IDLE
field.comment: The RecyclerView is not currently scrolling.

field.name: SCROLL_STATE_SETTLING
field.comment: The RecyclerView is currently animating to a final position while not under outside control.

field.name: TOUCH_SLOP_PAGING
field.comment: Constant for use with ScrollingTouchSlop. Indicates that the RecyclerView should use the standard touch slop for scrolling widgets that snap to a page or other coarse-grained barrier.

field.name: SCROLL_AXIS_VERTICAL
field.comment: Indicates scrolling along the vertical axis.

field.name: SCROLL_STATE_DRAGGING
field.comment: The RecyclerView is currently being dragged by outside input such as user touch input.

field.name: LAYOUT_DIRECTION_RTL
field.comment: Manifest : SetApplicationAttribute(android:supportsRtl, "true")

class.designerProperty: key:Count, displayname:Span Count, fieldtype:int, defaultvalue:1, minrange:1, description:Set RecyclerView Grid Span Count
key:LayoutDirection, displayname:Layout Direction, fieldtype:string, defaultvalue:Default, list:Default|RTL|LTR
key:Adapter, displayname:Default Adapter, fieldtype:boolean, defaultvalue:false, description:Show RecyclerView With Default Adapter

method.name: GapStrategy
method.comment: "GAP_HANDLING_LAZY" "GAP_HANDLING_MOVE_ITEMS_BETWEEN_SPANS" "GAP_HANDLING_NONE"

method.name: Build
method.comment: Set RecyclerView Layout Note : Don't call this when you want update recyclerview layout

method.name: ListView2
method.comment: Set Custom Space for Linear Layout array as int (left,top,right,bottom) Example : Recycler.SpaceItemDecoration.ListView2( _ Array As Int(10dip,10dip,10dip,0),Array As Int(10dip,10dip,10dip,0),Array As Int(10dip,10dip,10dip,10dip))

method.name: GridView2
method.comment: Set Custom Space for Grid Layout array as int (left,top,right,bottom)

method.name: Build
method.comment: Set RecyclerView Layout Note : Don't call this when you want update recyclerview layout

property.name: AlwaysDrawHorizontalScrollbarTrack
property.comment: Indicate whether the horizontal scrollbar track should always be drawn regardless of the extent. Defaults to false. Set to true if the track should always be drawn

property.name: OverScrollMode
property.comment: Set the over-scroll mode for this view.

property.name: ScrollBarStyle
property.comment: Specify the style of the scrollbars. The scrollbars can be overlaid or inset. When inset, they add to the padding of the view. And the scrollbars can be drawn inside the padding area or on the edge of the view. For example, if a view has a background drawable and you want to draw the scrollbars inside the padding specified by the drawable, you can use SCROLLBARS_INSIDE_OVERLAY or SCROLLBARS_INSIDE_INSET. If you want them to appear at the edge of the view, ignoring the padding, then you can use SCROLLBARS_OUTSIDE_OVERLAY or SCROLLBARS_OUTSIDE_INSET.

property.name: ScrollBarDelayBeforeFade
property.comment: Define the delay before scrollbars fade.

property.name: ScrollbarFadingEnabled
property.comment: Define whether scrollbars will fade when the view is not scrolling.

property.name: VerticalScrollBarEnabled
property.comment: Define whether the vertical scrollbar should be drawn or not.

property.name: ScrollBarSize
property.comment: Define the scrollbar size.

property.name: VerticalFadingEdgeEnabled
property.comment: Define whether the vertical edges should be faded when this view is scrolled vertically.

property.name: AlwaysDrawVerticalScrollbarTrack
property.comment: Indicate whether the vertical scrollbar track should always be drawn regardless of the extent. Defaults to false. Set to true if the track should always be drawn

property.name: VerticalScrollbarPosition
property.comment: Set the position of the vertical scroll bar.

property.name: HorizontalScrollBarEnabled
property.comment: Define whether the horizontal scrollbar should be drawn or not.

property.name: HorizontalFadingEdgeEnabled
property.comment: Define whether the horizontal edges should be faded when this view is scrolled horizontally.

field.name: SCROLLBARS_INSIDE_INSET
field.comment: The scrollbar style to display the scrollbars inside the padded area, increasing the padding of the view. The scrollbars will not overlap the content area of the view.

field.name: SCROLLBAR_POSITION_RIGHT
field.comment: Position the scroll bar along the right edge.

field.name: SCROLLBAR_POSITION_LEFT
field.comment: Position the scroll bar along the left edge.

field.name: OVER_SCROLL_NEVER
field.comment: Never allow a user to over-scroll this view.

field.name: SCROLLBARS_OUTSIDE_INSET
field.comment: The scrollbar style to display the scrollbars at the edge of the view, increasing the padding of the view. The scrollbars will only overlap the background, if any.

field.name: OVER_SCROLL_ALWAYS
field.comment: Always allow a user to over-scroll this view, provided it is a view that can scroll.

field.name: SCROLLBARS_INSIDE_OVERLAY
field.comment: The scrollbar style to display the scrollbars inside the content area, without increasing the padding. The scrollbars will be overlaid with translucency on the view's content.

field.name: SCROLLBAR_POSITION_DEFAULT
field.comment: Position the scroll bar at the default position as determined by the system.

field.name: OVER_SCROLL_IF_CONTENT_SCROLLS
field.comment: Allow a user to over-scroll this view only if the content is large enough to meaningfully scroll, provided it is a view that can scroll.

field.name: SCROLLBARS_OUTSIDE_OVERLAY
field.comment: The scrollbar style to display the scrollbars at the edge of the view, without increasing the padding. The scrollbars will be overlaid with translucency.

class.name: com.aghajari.rv.Amir_RecyclerViewPager
class.event: GetItemOffsets (OutRect As Rect,Item As Object,Position As Int)

Animate a scroll by the given amount of pixels along either axis.
dx: Pixels to scroll horizontally dy: Pixels to scroll vertically

Begin a standard fling with an initial velocity along each axis in pixels per second.
velocityX: Initial horizontal velocity in pixels per second velocityY: Initial vertical velocity in pixels per second

method.name: UpdateLayout
method.comment: update this recyclerview Layout

method.name: InvalidateItemDecorations
method.comment: Invalidates all ItemDecorations.

method.name: DefaultAdapter
method.comment: Initialize Default Adapter With RecyclerView EventName Example : RecyclerView.DefaultAdapter Sub EventName_onCreateViewHolder (Parent As Panel,ViewType As Int) End Sub Sub EventName_onBindViewHolder (Parent As Panel,Position As int) End Sub Sub EventName_GetItemCount As int Return 0 End Sub

method.name: FlingListener
method.comment: Set a RecyclerView OnFlingListener for this RecyclerView. Events : EventName_onFling (velocityX As int, velocityY As int) As Boolean Example : RecyclerView.Initializer("Amir").ListView.Build ... RecyclerView.FlingListener(True) ... Sub Amir_onFling (velocityX As int, velocityY As int) As Boolean Log("velocityX:" &velocityX&" | velocityY:"&velocityY) Return RecyclerView.Fling(velocityX,velocityY) 'Standard Fling End Sub

method.name: ItemOffsetsListener
method.comment: Enable or disable item offsets listener Event : EventName_GetItemOffsets (OutRect As Rect,Item As Object,Position As Int) Hidden Events : EventName_onDraw (c As Canvas) EventName_onDrawOver (c As Canvas) _________________________________________________________________________ Example : Space between items : RecyclerView.ItemOffsetsListener(True) Sub RecyclerView_GetItemOffsets (OutRect As Rect,Item As Object,Position As Int) OutRect.Top=10dip If Position = Recycler.Adapter2.ItemCount-1 Then OutRect.Bottom=10dip End If OutRect.Left=10dip OutRect.Right=10dip End Sub

method.name: SwapAdapter

RemoveAndRecycleExistingViews: If set to true, RecyclerView will recycle all existing Views. If adapters have stable ids and/or you want to animate the disappearing views, you may prefer to set this to false.

property.name: ItemAnimator

method.name: Vertical
method.comment: set Orientation To VERTICAL

method.name: Horizontal
method.comment: set Orientation To HORIZONTAL

method.name: ReverseLayout
method.comment: RTL Page

method.name: SnapMode
method.comment: Snap Mode None : 0 Start : 1 Center : 2 End : 3

class.name: com.aghajari.rv.Amir_RVAdapter
class.event: GetLoopPosition (Parent As Panel,LoopPosition As Int,Position As Int)
onItemTouch (Parent As Panel,Position As int,Action As int,X As Float,Y As Float)

method.name: EnableAdapterDataObserver
method.comment: Add Adapter Data Change Events EventName_onChanged As Boolean EventName_onItemRangeChanged (PositionStart As int,ItemCount As int) As Boolean EventName_onItemRangeInserted (PositionStart As int,ItemCount As int) As Boolean EventName_onItemRangeRemoved (PositionStart As int,ItemCount As int) As Boolean

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize New Adapter for RecyclerView

method.name: RemoveAdapter
method.comment: Remove Adapter

method.name: getItemViewType
method.comment: Return the view type of the item at <u>position</u> for the purposes of view recycling.

method.name: Clear
method.comment: Clear Adapters

method.name: getItemId
method.comment: Return the stable ID for the item at position. If HasStableIds would return false this method should return -1. The default implementation of this method returns -1. Position : Adapter position to query Return the stable ID of the item at position

method.name: GetAdapterIndex
method.comment: Get Index Of Adapter

method.name: AddAdapter2
method.comment: Add Adapter

method.name: RemoveAdapter2
method.comment: Remove Adapter

method.name: GetAdapter
method.comment: Get Adapter

method.name: AddAdapter
method.comment: Add Adapter

property.name: Size
property.comment: Get Adapters Size

property.name: HasStableIds
property.comment:
Returns true if this adapter publishes a unique <u>long</u> value that can act as a key for the item at a given position in the data set. If that item is relocated in the data set, the ID returned for that item should be the same.
Return true if this adapter's items have stable IDs

class.name: com.aghajari.rv.Amir_RVSmoothScroller
class.event: CalculateTimeForDeceleration (Dx As Int,DefaultTime As Int) As Int
CalculateTimeForScrolling (Dx As Int,DefaultTime As Int) As Int

method.name: CalculateSpeedPerPixel
method.comment: Calculates the scroll speed. return : The time (in ms) it should take for each pixel. For instance, if returned value is2 ms, it means scrolling 1000 pixels with LinearInterpolation should take 2 seconds.

method.name: Stop
method.comment: Stops running the SmoothScroller in each animation callback.

method.name: Start
method.comment: Start Smooth Scroll

method.name: SetSpeedPerPixel
method.comment: Speed : Milliseconds per inch or -1 for set default speed

method.name: CalculateTimeForDeceleration
method.comment: Calculates the time for deceleration so that transition from LinearInterpolator toDecelerateInterpolator looks smooth. dx : Distance to scroll return : Time for DecelerateInterpolator to smoothly traverse the distance when transitioningfrom LinearInterpolation

method.name: CalculateTimeForScrolling
method.comment: Calculates the time it should take to scroll the given distance (in pixels) dx : Distance in pixels that we want to scroll return : Time in milliseconds

property.name: IsRunning
property.comment: return True if SmoothScroller is currently active

property.name: IsPendingInitialRun
property.comment: Returns true if SmoothScroller has been started but has not received the first animation callback yet. return True if this SmoothScroller is waiting to start

property.name: TargetPosition
property.comment: set target adapter position for scroll

method.name: GetSpanSize
method.comment: Check Position In Grid Layout

method.name: EnableAdapterDataObserver
method.comment: Add Adapter Data Change Events EventName_onChanged As Boolean EventName_onItemRangeChanged (PositionStart As int,ItemCount As int) As Boolean EventName_onItemRangeInserted (PositionStart As int,ItemCount As int) As Boolean EventName_onItemRangeRemoved (PositionStart As int,ItemCount As int) As Boolean

method.name: RippleToView
method.comment: Add View To Ripple Parent Example : 'Add Ripple Dim Label As Label Label.Initialize("") Parent.AddView(Label,0,0,Parent.Width,Parent.Height) Utils.RippleToView(Label).Color(Colors.Gray).Build 'Get View Dim Label As Label = Utils.GetRippleView(Parent.GetView(0))

method.name: GetTextWidth
method.comment: Get Measure String Width

method.name: FilterSearchList
method.comment: Search in Adapter Data With TypeName List of data can instanceof Map , String , CustomType if Data value is String pass "" for TypeName

method.name: GetRippleView
method.comment: Get View From Ripple Parent

method.name: GetTextHeight
method.comment: Get Measure Multiline Text (CharSequence) Height

method.name: GetRVLayoutName
method.comment: Get Simple Name Of RecyclerView Layout Manager Class Name

method.name: ViewIndexToAdapterPosition
method.comment: Get Adapter Position From Visible View Index

method.name: ViewIndexToItemObject
method.comment: Get Item Object From Visible View Index

method.name: IsLastRow
method.comment: Check Position In Grid Layout

method.name: GetViewHolder
method.comment: Get RecyclerView ViewHolder. Note that you can use this method just in onBindViewHolder event!

method.name: GetLoopPosition
method.comment: Get Loop Position from Item Position on Amir_RVLoopAdapter (FullLoop) return -1 if adapter is not in full loop mode

method.name: GetLoopPrevPosition
method.comment: Get Previous Loop Position of Item Position on Amir_RVLoopAdapter (FullLoop) return -1 if adapter is not in full loop mode

method.name: IsFirstRow
method.comment: Check Position In Grid Layout

method.name: GetParentFromItemObject
method.comment: Get Recycler View Item Parent From Object if Using Default RecyclerView Adapter (Amir_RVAdapter)

method.name: GetLoopNextPosition
method.comment: Get Next Loop Position of Item Position on Amir_RVLoopAdapter (FullLoop) return -1 if adapter is not in full loop mode

method.name: ViewIndexToViewHolder
method.comment: Get View Holder From Visible View Index

method.name: GetPositionFromLoop
method.comment: Get Real Item Position from Loop Position return -1 if adapter is not in Loop mode

method.name: ColorProvider
method.comment: Event : EventName_DividerColor (Position As Int) As Int

method.name: SizeProvider
method.comment: Event : EventName_DividerSize (Position As Int) As Int

method.name: VisibilityProvider
method.comment: Event : EventName_DividerVisibility (Position As Int) As Boolean

method.name: MarginProvider
method.comment: Event : EventName_DividerLeftMargin (Position As Int) As Int EventName_DividerRightMargin (Position As Int) As Int

method.name: Padding
method.comment: Set Padding indicator lines from top or bottom

method.name: Gravity
method.comment: Set Indicator Position. BOTTOM | TOP Default is Bottom.

method.name: ColorProvider
method.comment: Event : EventName_DividerColor (Position As Int) As Int

method.name: SizeProvider
method.comment: Event : EventName_DividerSize (Position As Int) As Int

method.name: VisibilityProvider
method.comment: Event : EventName_DividerVisibility (Position As Int) As Boolean

method.name: MarginProvider
method.comment: Event : EventName_DividerTopMargin (Position As Int) As Int EventName_DividerBottomMargin (Position As Int) As Int

method.name: Matches
method.comment: Check content matches with pattern

method.name: IsMatch
method.comment: Check content matches with pattern

method.name: Equal
method.comment: Select for Equal contents

method.name: Matcher
method.comment: Check content matches with pattern pass index -1 for default

method.name: Contains
method.comment: Check content contains value

method.name: StartsWith
method.comment: Check content starts with value

method.name: EndsWith
method.comment: Check content ends with value

method.name: SetOnFlingListener
method.comment: This class defines the behavior of fling if the developer wishes to handle it. Events : EventName_onFling (arg0 As Int,arg1 As Int)

method.name: AddItemOffsets
method.comment: Add Item Offset Listener. Index : index of item decoration. pass -1 for default Event : EventName_GetItemOffsets (OutRect As Rect,Item As Object,Position As Int) Hidden Events : EventName_onDraw (c As Canvas) EventName_onDrawOver (c As Canvas)

method.name: AddOnItemTouchListener
method.comment: An OnItemTouchListener allows the application to intercept touch events in progress at the view hierarchy level of the RecyclerView before those touch events are considered for RecyclerView's own scrolling behavior. Events : EventName_onInterceptTouchEvent (Action As Int,X As Float,Y As Float,MotionEvent As Object) As Boolean EventName_onRequestDisallowInterceptTouchEvent (arg As Boolean) EventName_onTouchEvent (Action As Int,X As Float,Y As Float,MotionEvent As Object)

method.name: AddOnChildAttachStateChangeListener
method.comment: A Listener interface that can be attached to a RecylcerView to get notified whenever a ViewHolder is attached to or detached from RecyclerView Events : EventName_onChildViewAttachedToWindow (ItemObject As Object) EventName_onChildViewDetachedFromWindow (ItemObject As Object)

method.name: AddOnScrollListener
method.comment: An OnScrollListener can be added to a RecyclerView to receive messages when a scrolling event has occurred on that RecyclerView. Events : EventName_onScrollStateChanged (NewState As Int) EventName_onScrolled (Dx As Int,Dy As Int)
